about_the_game:
Welcome to Gravity Break – a physics-driven space adventure simulation where trade, rocket science, and cheese collide in a post-post-apocalyptic Solar System.

  • Solve the worst possible scenario for an ecological catastrophe while trading cheese and getting rich.

  • Experience rocket physics somaesthetically, understand the rocket equation and balance your fuel load

  • Colonize the solar system in a world of enslaved cows producing milk for mice and apes

  • Fight for the diversity of life and the efficient utilization of a dying solar system

As the last human cheese courier, your mission is to rebuild civilization across planets and moons – one ton of cheese at a time. But this isn’t just a simple delivery gig. With realistic physics systems, a dynamic economy, and an absurd world filled with AI-driven mice, Gravity Break will challenge both your strategy and your sense of humor.

Core Gameplay: Physics, Trade, and Exploration

  • Realistic Space Physics: Master gravity, execute daring slingshot maneuvers, and optimize fuel for heavy cargo in an accessible 2D simulation.

  • Dynamic Economy: Supply, demand, and planetary environments dictate your trading opportunities – plan your routes wisely and reap the rewards.

  • From Soil to Cheese: Deliver everything from soil and seeds to grazing animals, producing cheese that feeds colonies and keeps your ship running.

An Absurd Universe to Explore

After humanity’s fall, mice and a rogue AI have taken over the galaxy with a dream of spreading life. As the last human, you’ll face:

  • Bilby Pretzl: An idealist who might hold the key to the future – or the end of everything.

  • OLLI 87-042: Your trustworthy but enigmatic onboard AI with more on its mind than instructions.

Upgrade your rocket, uncover hidden secrets, and navigate a universe where cheese is gold, and every choice matters.

Who Is This Game For?

  • Gamers who love accessible physics and creative trading.

  • Fans of classics like Elite and Escape Velocity, looking for a new, approachable challenge.

  • Anyone who’s ever dreamed of running a cheese shop in space.

Join the Journey!

Gravity Break is still in active development, and your feedback can shape its future. Play the demo, share your thoughts, and help us build a cheese-powered galaxy
